description: Removes previously created Windows Firewall rules that were blocking a specific application. Accepts the application name used during blocking and deletes the associated inbound and outbound rules. Logs all actions and outputs a JSON report for SOC automation.

script_parameters.name: app name
script_parameters.description: ⚠️ Application name or full file path. IMPORTANT: Windows paths must be written with double backslashes (\). Example: C:\Users\user\Desktop\Test.exe
